data.text: @CaliKatBird Thatâ€™s exciting! The kids are so lucky to have you there again!

@OakAndRedwood9 Have lesson plan & notes but going in w/less than optimal info about timing. Kept getting undermined by new rules/procedures so jumped on these dates while we had the chance w/little prep time. I'm probably overthinking it, I know I have what I need. Semper Gumby #alwaysflexible

@CaliKatBird Yay! Have tons of fun! I remember lots of "OMG, teacher, did you SEE THIS?" being called out across the room during that activity in our after school program.🥰 (if you're really worried, I can suggest just jotting down an outline to follow - that helps me on brain foggy days)
